mapper.select: select * from Bulletin order by num desc

insert into Bulletin(b_num, m_num, b_file_or_quiz,b_title, b_content, b_word, b_file1, b_file2, b_file3, b_date, b_select, q_num) values(#{b_num}, #{m_num}, #{b_file_or_quiz}, #{b_title}, #{b_content}, #{b_word}, #{b_file1}, #{b_file2}, #{b_file3}, now(), #{b_select}, #{q_num},)
